FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: "The Cloud Nacatl sit and think, a bunch of soft paws. We are the Claws of Marisi, stalking, pouncing, drawing blood."
"Il Nugolo Nacatl siede e pensa, un branco di mollaccioni. Noi siamo gli Artigli di Marisi, cacciamo furtivamente, piombiamo sulla preda e spargiamo sangue."
„Die Wolken-Nacatl sitzen nur herum, denken nach und wärmen ihre Pfoten. Doch wir sind Marisis Klauen, wir schleichen, wir springen und wir fordern Blut."
« Le nacatl des nuages s'assoit et pense, quelle patte-molle ! Nous sommes les Griffes de Marisi, chassantes, bondissantes et saignantes. »
"Los Nacatl de las nubes se sientan y piensan... unos suaves. Nosotros somos las Garras de Marisi, acechamos, cazamos y desangramos."
「雲のナカティルは腰掛け物思い、柔らかな手の数多あり。 我らマリーシの爪。忍び、飛びつき、血を流させる者。」
"The Cloud Nacatl sit and think, a bunch of soft paws. We are the Claws of Marisi, stalking, pouncing, drawing blood."
«Накатльцы Облачного прайда сидят и размышляют, сложа изнеженные лапы. Мы же, Когти Маризи, преследуем, набрасываемся, проливаем кровь».
"O Nacatl das Nuvens senta e pensa, um monte de patas peludas. Nós somos as Garras de Marisi, rastejando, saltando, arrancando sangue."

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain.
La Nacatl Selvatica prende +1/+1 fintanto che controlli una Montagna.
Der Wilde Nacatl erhält +1/+1, solange du ein Gebirge kontrollierst.
Le Nacatl sauvage gagne +1/+1 tant que vous contrôlez une montagne.
La Nacatl salvaje obtiene +1/+1 mientras controles una montaña.
野生のナカティルは、あなたが山をコントロールしているかぎり＋１/＋１の修整を受ける。
Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain.
Накатльская Дикарка получает +1/+1, пока вы контролируете Гору.
Nacatl Selvagem recebe +1/+1 enquanto você controlar uma Montanha.
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local total = 0 local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddSubType( LAND_TYPE_MOUNTAIN ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() total = filter:CountStopAt( 1 ) if total > 0 then local characteristics = Object():GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Power_Add( 1 ) characteristics:Toughness_Add( 1 ) end

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.
La Nacatl Selvatica prende +1/+1 fintanto che controlli una Pianura.
Der Wilde Nacatl erhält +1/+1, solange du eine Ebene kontrollierst.
Le Nacatl sauvage gagne +1/+1 tant que vous contrôlez une plaine.
La Nacatl salvaje obtiene +1/+1 mientras controles una llanura.
野生のナカティルは、あなたが平地をコントロールしているかぎり＋１/＋１の修整を受ける。
Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.
Накатльская Дикарка получает +1/+1, пока вы контролируете Равнину.
Nacatl Selvagem recebe +1/+1 enquanto você controlar uma Planície.
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local total = 0 local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddSubType( LAND_TYPE_PLAINS ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() total = filter:CountStopAt( 1 ) if total > 0 then local characteristics = Object():GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Power_Add( 1 ) characteristics:Toughness_Add( 1 ) end
